LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedArm.label: Advanced arm
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedArm.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this arm a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedArm.comps.0.tools.0.label: fist
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedLeg.label: Advanced leg
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedLeg.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this leg a significant advantage over standard issue parts.

LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedVisualSensor.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this visual sensor a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedAudioSensor.label: Advanced audio sensor
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedAudioSensor.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this audio sensor a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedHeatsink.label: Advanced heatsink
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedHeatsink.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this heatsink a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedCoolantPump.label: Advanced coolant pump
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedCoolantPump.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this coolant pump a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedBattery.label: Advanced battery pack
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedBattery.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this battery a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedMechaniteStorage.label: Advanced mechanite storage
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedMechaniteStorage.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this mechanite storage a significant advantage over standard issue parts. Higher quality mechanites means injuries will be repaired quicker.
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedReactor.label: Advanced bio-reactor
LanguageData.ATR_AdvancedReactor.description: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this reactor a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ATR_OrganicCharger.label: organic charger
LanguageData.ATR_OrganicCharger.description: An advanced bionic part that allows organics that have this installed to charge. It requires considerable energy itself, leading to faster consumption, and reduces the amount of nutrition absorbed when eating food.
